# Controller Tool Compensation

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-compensation`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Length, radius, wear compensation

## Capabilities

- Handle tool compensation for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller tool compensation.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller tool compensation capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-gcode-reference`

## Hooks

- `gcode:compensation:generate`
- `gcode:compensation:validate`
